Class DepartmentsController

java.lang.Object
kp.company.controller.DepartmentsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
kp.company.api.DepartmentsApi
@RestController @Validated public class DepartmentsController extends Object implements kp.company.api.DepartmentsApi
The controller for the Department.
The implementation of the DepartmentsApi. The order of methods here is equals to the order of endpoints on the Swagger page.
